login.tos: By signing up you agree to our Terms of Service and our very strict Privacy Policy.
login.header:
Hello and welcome to
the world of secure messaging!

messages.loginSuccess: Success! We'll log you in securely now...
messages.ambiguousProcess: This username exists. You can choose to continue logging in or register an unique name.
messages.incorrectPassword: Your password is incorrect. Please try again.
messages.registerMessage: This username is free. You can continue to choose a secure password...
messages.registerSuccess: Welcome on board! We'll log you in securely now...
messages.invalidUsername: A-Z a-z 0-9 are allowed for usernames. Special characters and spaces are not.
messages.genericErrorMessage: Something went wrong. Please start over.
messages.passwordTooShort: Your password is too short. It should consist of 8 characters minimum.

login.privateUser: Not a Business User? Switch to Private
login.businessUser: Not a Private User? Switch to Business

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.searchResultExplain: If you cannot find who you are looking for, try searching for their username.

topic.fileTooBigTitle: The size is too damn high!
topic.fileTooBigDetail: File uploads for private users are currently limited to {{max_size}}MB.

reportConfirm.title: Report this Chat?
reportConfirm.message: Please confirm that you want to report this chat. We will then get in touch with you.

add.title: Add more Contacts
add.selectedExplain: Above contacts will be added to the conversation.

chooseFriends.title: Select Contacts
chooseFriends.selectedExplain: Above contacts will be added to the new conversation. You can later manage all members and add more.
chooseFriends.selectedExplainAdd: Above contacts will be added to this conversation.

settings.title: Settings

logout.title: Are you sure you want to log out on this device?

settings.pushAlert: This feature is not ready yet but we are working on it, promise!

backup.title: Save your Backup Key?
backup.message:
You will now see your backup key to save it. With this key you can reset your password.

Therefore please keep it in a really safe place.

blocked.listExplanation: This is a list of all users you blocked. They are greyed out in other listings. Unblock these users with the "Unblock" button in their respective profiles.
blocked.title: Blocked Users

success.heading: Contact verified
success.body: This contact is now verified. This contact should also verify you, to ensure the highest level of security.

fail.heading: Something went wrong
fail.body: The scanned QR-Code does not match this user. Simply try it again.

profile.idExplanation:
This is your personal and unique ID on whispeer. You need this to verify with Contacts â€” for extra security!

They scan your ID, you scan their IDs and both of you easily increased your security measures again. Cool, huh?

contacts.acceptRequestQuestion: Do you want to add {{name}} as a Contact?
contacts.sendRequestQuestion: Do you want to send {{name}} a Contact Request?
contacts.removeQuestion: Are you sure that you want to remove {{name}} from your Contacts?
contacts.requestSentMessage: You've sent a Contact Request to {{name}}.

blockConfirm.title: Block this User?
blockConfirm.message: Blocking protects you from anything this user will send to you. You will not be notified about their activities and they will appear greyed out in listings.

reportConfirm.title: Report this User?
reportConfirm.message: Please confirm that you want to report this user. We will get in touch with you.

image.removeQuestion: Are you sure that you want to remove your Picture?

sales.title: Hey! It seems like you aren't a Business User yet...
sales.text: whispeer brings the most secure way of encrypted communication to the professional world - for you and your company. Try it now!
sales.privateUser: Not a Business User? Switch to Private
